A Christmas Princess

Ano: 2019

Sinopse: Jessica, a struggling chef living in a trendy New York borough, takes over a small restaurant, but it's growing tough to make ends meet. Prince Jack, who's in the city for his family's annual Christmas charity dinner, finds himself in need of a last-minute chef for a royal event when he meets Jessica. As their relationship evolves and a romance blooms, so do the obstacles. But as the event arrives, Jessica decides to go through with the dinner, and may just get the best Christmas present of all.—Hybrid, LLC
